title: NFL Draft Round 1 Reaction (Ep. 103)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays, Mike Lombardi, and Kevin Clark huddle up to discuss their initial reactions to the Chicago Bears trading up for Mitchell Trubisky (01:00), the surprising Corey Davis pick (06:30), picks they loved (09:30), and great players left on the board (21:30).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
